bibl.title: An Imitation of opus alexandrinum in Wall Painting? Two Wall Paintings from Kom el-Dikka (Alexandria).
bibl.note: The first of the two wall paintings in question was discovered in 1987 in room A of sector G in the western end of the southern portico of the baths. The second was discovered in 1991 in house H of sector W1N.
bibl.seg: TKACZOW Barbara, An Imitation of opus alexandrinum in Wall Painting? Two Wall Paintings from Kom el-Dikka (Alexandria).

The first of the two wall paintings in question was discovered in 1987 in room A of sector G in the western end of the southern portico of the baths. The second was discovered in 1991 in house H of sector W1N.
